While in her ice dimension, Kaguya causes ice to condense and freeze around her opponents, holding them in place, the intense cold injuring them.

== Trivia ==
* The name of this technique is derived from the [[Wikipedia:Himuro Shrine|Shintō shrine]] residing in [[wikipedia:Nara, Nara|Nara, Nara Prefecture]] of Japan.

[[pt-br:Ame-no-Himuro]]
[[pl:Amenohimuro]]
